Indian Economy.title: Trump has announced G2 – with China. What should India do
Indian Economy.summary: S Jaishankar once said that India’s policy of multi-alignment would require it to 'engage America, manage China, cultivate Europe, reassure Russia'. India is now required to, in fact, 'manage' America and 'engage' China, while continuing to 'reassure' Russia

Indian Economy.title: Cost of living: Should India's tracker of retail inflation account for free food handouts under PMGKAY?
Indian Economy.summary: India’s massive free foodgrain scheme has eased the cost of living for more than half of all households, but it also raises a tricky question: Should the consumer price index be revised accordingly? Or should our most important statistics reflect conceptual c…

Indian Economy.title: After rebranding, Generali Central launches first brand campaign for both general, life insurances
Indian Economy.summary: The brand campaign, “Here Now”, aims to highlight the importance of timely financial protection at a time when India’s insurance penetration--life and non-life put together-- continues to be low hovering at below four per cent of GDP

Indian Economy.title: Beijing’s AI push has meant mass adoption but how this could boost its economy is unclear
Indian Economy.summary: China’s surge in AI users looks like a major win for Beijing’s ‘AI Plus’ push—but what does it mean for the economy? As hundreds of millions take to new chatbots and assistants, the real test will be whether this wave of adoption leads to lasting productivity…

Indian Economy.title: How local topography contributes to air pollution
Indian Economy.summary: While air quality in Delhi slips into the “very poor” category, slow winds and dipping temperatures are further expected to push the capital towards an air emergency. But how do spatial factors and local topography further add to the air quality challenges?

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction Today – November 03, 2025:  Nifty Bank Futures: Resistance ahead; go long only on a break above it
Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank index has begun the week on a positive note. The index has risen well from a low of 57,718.40 made in the early trades. It is currently trading at 57,992, up 0.37 per cent. The advances/declines ratio is at 9:3. This is positive.

Startups & Funding.title: Karnataka Govt to hold Future Makers’ Conclave during Bengaluru Tech Summit on November 18-20; focus on deep tech and AI
Startups & Funding.summary: With over 10,000 entrepreneurs from across the country participating, the Future Makers' Conclave will be larger than the Startup Mahakumbh organised by the Centre.

Startups & Funding.title: Real estate startup Neoliv plots ₹1,000 crore sales in first year of operations
Startups & Funding.summary: Neoliv is currently raising its maiden fund of  ₹1,000 crore. It has raised  ₹750 crore so far. The second fund, of  ₹2,000 crore, will be launched in FY27.

Startups & Funding.title: Karnataka to invest ₹600 crore; aims to become India’s DeepTech Capital
Startups & Funding.summary: The ₹600 crore investment in Deep Tech includes ₹150 crore for DeepTech Elevate Fund, with a special focus on AI and frontier technologies

Startups & Funding.title: PM Modi launches ₹1-lakh crore RDI scheme; 25,000 new Atal Labs planned
Startups & Funding.summary: Speaking at the Emerging Science, Technology and Innovation Conclave 2025, Modi announced plans to set up 25,000 new Atal Tinkering Labs, introduce 10,000 additional PM Research Fellowships, and expand private participation in R&D.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI to meet banks, dealers amid liquidity strain, say sources
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI to meet banks and dealers to address liquidity concerns impacting the government bond market amid changing market conditions.

Banking & Finance.title: Goldman Sachs backs bullish rupee wager banking on tariff turnaround
Banking & Finance.summary: Taking positive cues from developments in India-US trade negotiations, analysts at Goldman Sachs expect the rupee to appreciate by 1-2% if US tariffs on Indian goods are set at or below 25%

Banking & Finance.title: Shriram Finance eyes expanding gold loan portfolio: Vice Chairman
Banking & Finance.summary: Revankar expects NIM to rise to 8.5% by FY26 end from 8.19% in Q2, and credit cost to continue being lower than 2% in FY26.

Banking & Finance.title: Banking law amendment streamlines succession
Banking & Finance.summary: The new measures, enabling multiple nominees, will help in faster settlement and clear asset-sharing mechanisms

Banking & Finance.title: Rupee stablecoins regulated by RBI: Is this a crypto idea whose time has come?
Banking & Finance.summary: Should India take a cue from America’s Genius Act and permit the launch of suitably regulated digital tokens? A cryptosceptic RBI is best placed to weigh the idea’s risks against its rewards—and articulate an Indian vision for the evolution of money.

Technology Sector.title: Azad Engineering: Rolls-Royce and Boeing’s go-to Indian supplier — But is it overvalued?
Technology Sector.summary: Azad Engineering, a key supplier of precision engine parts for giants like Boeing and Rolls-Royce, boasts a massive Rs 6,000 crore order book. But with its stock trading at a 100x+ P/E, can it justify the sky-high valuation?

Technology Sector.summary: SPPU is the only university, other than IITs, with which the Indian Space Research Organisation (Isro) does collaborative research, according to the director of Isro-SPPU Space Technology Cell.
